0.2.name: wordpress/wp-boastful
0.2.description:
When I saw 'boastful' library by Zach Holman, I wanted it on my blog, so I created this plugin to easily integrate this library to any wordpress blog. What boastful does is that it shows 'tweetback' to you blog post.

It shows you the avatar of people talking about your blog post on twitter, and the actual content of the tweet on hover of the image.

This plugin is brought to you by WPoets team.
